language.description: Extender for BardCanvas Mobile to deliver post comments.

prompts.trash:
The comment will be sent to the trash can. If the author is a registered user, a notification will be sent to them.

Do you want to proceed?
prompts.reject:
The comment will be removed from the page. If the author is a registered user, a notification will be sent to them.

Do you want to proceed?

messages.comment_id_not_provided: Sorry, but you must provide the id of the comment.
messages.comment_not_found: The comment wasn't found on the database. It should have been deleted.
